content.rendered:
Autoimmune Disease Nutrition Program

Book Free Consultation

Program Description

Our autoimmune disease nutrition programme is based scientific principles of nutrition care process and is designed to manage autoimmune disorders through proper nutrition. Our registered dietitians work with you to develop a personalised diet plan that includes anti-inflammatory nutrients, gut health support, and immune-boosting foods to reduce inflammation and improve immune function. Our program also includes lifestyle modifications and stress management techniques to support overall well-being.

Key Benefits of
this Program

Reduced Inflammation:
By reducing inflammation in the body, proper nutrition can aid in the management of autoimmune disorders. Anti-inflammatory nutrients such as omega-3 fatty acids, vitamin D, and fibre can help lower inflammatory markers in the blood.

Enhanced Immune Function: Autoimmune disorders occur when the body’s immune system attacks healthy cells. Nutritional supplements can boost immune function and lower the risk of autoimmune attacks. Vitamins A, C, and E, as well as zinc and selenium, play an important role in immune system support.

Improved Gut Health:
Gut health is frequently linked to autoimmune disorders. Proper nutrition can help improve gut health by encouraging the growth of beneficial gut bacteria and decreasing inflammation.

Price and package
details for program

Pakage Variation

It’s important to note that the cost of the program may vary depending on factors such as the type and severity of autoimmune disease, other coexisting medical conditions, and the type and frequency of counselling and support needed.

Total Costing & Duration

Starting prices – INR 60,000

Duration – 3 Months

Read Success Stories
from Our Client

Book Free Consultation

@graph.name: Autoimmune Disease, Lipus Diet Nutrition Program - Echha Joshi
@graph.description: Our autoimmune disease nutrition programme is based scientific principles of nutrition care process . We help in Autoimmune disease & Lupus diet program.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
